text:
@Jacob_Rees_Mogg Nonsense and undermines Government guidance aimed protect public health in the middle (early weeks) of a public health emergency:

"Stay Alert:

- work from home if you can"

You can. You have. You should.

https://t.co/mzGflkmZXG
